Overview of humdrumR

Nathaniel Condit-Schultz

2022-02-24

Source: vignettes/Overview.Rmd
Overview.Rmd

Welcome to “Overview of humdrumR”! This document will give you a very brief overview of what the humdrumR package is, and what it can do. If you’re all ready to start learning how to use humdrumR, checkout getting started with humdrumR

#What is humdrumR?

humdrumR is is a R package for the visualization, manipulation, and analysis of data encoded in the Humdrum syntax [http://www.humdrum.org].

What is humdrum?

Humdrum is a system for analyzing blah blah.
